pages.title: Luck & Chest Rarity
pages.text: Vault Hunters makes use of the $(#033dfc)Luck Effect$() & a Chest Rarity Attribute to modify Loot Tables to further increase their qualities!$(br2)Both of these can be obtained in various ways, such as Powerups like Vault Apples, Vault Modifiers and Vault Gear!

pages.title: Mechanic
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Luck$() increases the potential (#033dfc)rolls$() of Chests inside the Vault, having a $(#033dfc)50%$() chance to adding another filled slot to the chest for each $(#033dfc)Effect Level$().$(br)$(#033dfc)Chest Rarity$() multiplies the amount of Chest Rarity by the chances of getting a chest that is NOT common, making $(#033dfc)Rare+ Chests$() more common in return.
